overview: Upcoming Prashanth Neel Film starring NTR
title: NTR Neel

overview: In 1980s rural Andhra Pradesh, A spirited villager unites his community through sports to defend their pride against a powerful rival.
title: Peddi

overview: A marginalized tribe stripped of their rights find hope in an unlikely leader, who guides their fight for citizenship and recognition in a system designed to keep them oppressed.
title: The Paradise

overview: Upcoming Family Entertainer Starring Naveen Polishetty & Meenakshi Chaudhary
title: Anaganaga Oka Raju

overview: Revolves around a broken-up couple who cross paths again in a violent dystopian world.
title: Dacoit

overview: A young heir embraces both his royal heritage and rebellious spirit as he rises to power, establishing unprecedented rules during his reign as Raja Saab.
title: The Raja Saab

overview: In a land ruled by a ruthless tyrant, a young man embarks on a dangerous quest to dismantle the warlords empire and free his people from oppression.
title: Sambarala Yetti Gattu

overview: OG revolves around a ruthless gangster named Ojas Gambheera "OG" who returns to Mumbai after disappearing for 10 years on a personal crusade to finish crime bosses.
title: They Call Him OG

overview: Following the historic Kalinga battle, where King Ashoka of the Maurya dynasty emerged as the winner, he chose to walk the path of peace instead of continuing warfare. Yet, the kingdom appointed nine warriors to protect some ancient scriptures rumored to have the ability to make someone divine or godlike.
title: Mirai

overview: A model from Mumbai comes down to Hyderabad to meet the director Mohan Kumar. Mohan is planning a film based on Tinder and is keen on casting her as the lead.
title: Ranganaayaki

overview: A tale of every spy can end up being a conspiracy theory. But their truth can never be disregarded.  A name that will be remembered by the masses in the coming years.  The Silent crown longing for a new ruler finds a new name, a powerhouse of aura, a persona that no one will dare to ignore.
title: Kingdom

overview: Follows the story of an empowered woman who gets entangled with weed trade due to circumstances.
title: Ghaati

overview: an emotional story of a brother who goes to any extent to safeguard his sister from multiple challenges in her life.
title: Thammudu

overview: A fictional village faces an extraordinary crisis as the cemetery runs out of space. Uproarious chaos ensues as the community rallies together, finding inventive solutions to overcome this unusual predicament.
title: Uppu Kappurambu

overview: An atheist hunter Kannappa becomes a devotee of Lord Shiva and plucked out his eyes in an act of devotion.
title: Kannappa

original_title: హరి హర వీర మల్లు : భాగం 1 - Sword vs Spirit
overview: Set in the Mughal Era, outlaw Veera Mallu is tasked with the job of stealing the Koh-i-Noor diamond from the Mughals.
title: Hari Hara Veera Mallu : Part 1 - Sword vs Spirit

overview: A talented karate student embarks on a journey of self-discovery where she experiences both love and loss.
title: 8 Vasantalu

overview: A ruthless billionaire, Neeraj, uses beggars as benamis to launder money, with the help of a disgraced civil submit servant, Deepak. One of the beggars, Deva, escapes with ₹10,000 crores and becomes the target of a deadly manhunt. He meets Sameera, who joins him in his mission to use the money to uplift society's poor. With Deepak's help, Deva fights back.
title: Kuberaa

overview: Two assassins are assigned to kill the son of a reputed producer.  Guns and Betrayal survive the Rivalry.
title: Bhaag!!

overview: Two mischievous middle-aged friends regularly stir up trouble in their village, causing chaos. A police constable tries to keep their antics under control.
title: Badmashulu

overview: Kaushik, a timid medical student, finds himself battling not only his inner demons but also a sinister entity named Ghatikachalam that whispers through shadows and feeds on his fears. As his nights turn sleepless and his grip on reality begins to shatter, his family resorts to ancient spiritual rites to save him from a force far beyond their understanding.
title: Ghatikachalam

overview: The relationship between three childhood friends begins to crumble as their loyalty is tested.
title: Bhairavam

overview: "OKA BRUNDAVANAM" follows Maha, Raja Vikram, and Nainika as they unite to fulfill a mother's dream, uncover a Christmas mystery, and embark on a journey of self-discovery, unity, and the magic of granting wishes.
title: Oka Brundavanam

overview: Vaibhav, a righteous young man with entrepreneurial dreams, finds himself entwined in a profound mosaic of love, family, and friendships.
title: Vaibhavam

overview: A brave fisherman fights a corrupt politician to defend his village on Nellore Sea Shore after coastal displacement. His rebellion ignites a revolution that spreads beyond Krishna Lanka, showcasing courage and sacrifice.
title: Veeraaraju 1991

overview: Isha, an air hostess and model, joins photographer Ruben for a shoot at his iconic spot, Lovedale. A night in a remote forest bungalow takes a terrifying turn as unexpected dangers arise. Will they survive the horrors that await?
title: Lovedale

overview: 23 (Iravai Moodu) is a hard-hitting social drama that interweaves three gripping narratives inspired by real-life tragedies: the 1991 Tsunduru massacre, the 1993 Chilakaluripeta bus burning incident, and the 1997 Hyderabad car bomb blast.  Bold, unflinching, and deeply thought-provoking, 23 serves as a powerful outcry for dignity, justice, and societal reform.
title: 23 (Iravai Moodu)

overview: A school teacher uses innovative storytelling methods to help struggling students, overcoming various challenges to achieve his goal.
title: Anaganaga

overview: When 24-year-old Divya is found dead, what initially appears to be a suicide soon unravels into a gripping murder mystery. Officer Vikram, known for his sharp instincts, delves into a maze of hidden motives involving Divya's husband, stepchild, and maid. As buried secrets come to light and tensions rise, Vikram must investigate a house full of suspects and uncover the truth before time runs out.
title: Blind Spot

overview: Vijay, a bank employee, falls in love with Purva at first sight and attempts to get closer to her in hopes of winning her affection. Meanwhile, Harini who secretly harbours feelings for Vijay, begins to follow him—turning his love life into a comedic triangle.
title: #Single

overview: Set in the early 2000s, in the pre-internet days of coastal Bheemili, A group of married men band together to find solutions, after their wives get possessed while watching a cable TV soap opera serial.
title: Subham

overview: The Homicide Intervention Team (HIT) sends ruthless police officer Arjun Sarkaar to find a group of killers and stop their grisly murder spree.
title: HIT: The Third Case

overview: A failed UPI sparks a chance encounter between Adarsh and his longtime crush, Aadhya. As a playful bond blossoms in a dreamy, aesthetic world, an unexpected twist threatens it all, A tale of love, patience and a fight to make things right.
title: Sahanam

overview: A girl with PTSD turns to a therapist for help, but as their session progress, the boundaries between reality and memory begin to blur. She’s searching for healing—but at what cost?
title: Relax Meera

overview: Three college students embark on a quest for answers. As they follow a trail of cryptic clues, they uncover a startling secret. But when the truth comes to light, one question remains - will they act on it or not?
title: Diksuchi

overview: Four aspiring criminals plan to rob the local bank at India's most richest and peaceful village, on the pretext of shooting a documentary. But their heist plans are disrupted when they discover the seemingly tranquil community harbors sinister secrets.
title: Chaurya Paatam

overview: Sarangapani, a man who finds comfort in the guidance of horoscopes, sets off on a turbulent journey that forces him to confront some hard truths about himself and his life.
title: Sarangapani Jathakam

overview: A political action drama behind government freebies.
title: Suryapet Junction

overview: "Dear Uma" is a film that narrates the story of Dev, a rock star who falls in love with Uma, a medical student. As the plot unfolds, Dev realizes that he is enamored with Uma's soul rather than Uma herself. The central mystery revolves around why Dev is the only one who can perceive the soul of Uma, who had passed away long ago.
title: Dear Uma

overview: Arjun, an IPS aspirant turned kind-hearted gangster, learns that Pathaan, a notorious terrorist, wants to exact revenge on his principled mother Vyjayanthi, an honest IPS officer, and sets out to protect Vyjayanthi and their bond is put to the test.
title: Arjun S/O Vyjayanthi

overview: It tells the story of a saviour called Odela Mallanna Swamy who protects a village from evil forces.
title: Odela 2

overview: Akkada Ammai Ikkada Abbaai is a Telugu film. Directed by Nithin-Bharath. Starring pradeep machiraju and deepika pilli in the lead role.
title: Akkada Ammai Ikkada Abbai

overview: Jack, an aspiring but overeager intelligence agent, goes against protocol and the real spies, to foil a potential attack on home turf.
title: Jack

overview: Explores the subconscious horrors of a writer who struck in writer's block
title: Andhakaaram

overview: A photographer's obsession with a young woman escalates to dangerous heights.
title: Saaree

overview: A beautiful father-son duo navigates love, betrayal, and redemption amidst a betting mafia and police chase, unveiling a heartfelt journey of debts and dreams.
title: LYF - Love Your Father

overview: 28 degrees celsius is a romantic suspense thriller centred around Anjali, who suffers from a brain injury that makes her vulnerable to extreme temperatures and she must remain at a constant 28C to survive. As Karthik fights to protect her, unexpected twists unfold, blending love and suspense in a gripping narrative that keeps audiences on the edge.
title: 28 Degree Celsius

overview: In a calculated scheme, a plan was devised to kidnap the daughter-in-law of a sitting MLA. The operation was entrusted to a skilled individual known for handling such matters effectively. This person, in turn, passed the plan along to a network of five accomplices. However, tragedy struck when one of the members unexpectedly died in an accident, disrupting the chain of communication and complicating the operation. The story unfolds as the MLA races against time, using wit and resolve to outsmart the kidnappers and ultimately retain his loved one’s safety, even amidst the chaos caused by the broken chain of the plot.
title: Madhushala

overview: Ram, a modern-day Robin Hood, is a master thief who unexpectedly finds himself switching sides. When fate forces him to become the personal security officer for Neera, a rollercoaster ride of action, comedy, and unexpected twists follows.
title: Robinhood

overview: "Mad Square", serving as a sequel to the 2023 hit "Mad". This installment continues the adventures of college friends Ashok, DD, and Manoj as they embark on a trip to Goa, leading to a series of humorous and unpredictable events.
title: (MAD)²

overview: A Light, Heartwarming, and conflict-less film on School Nostalgia with a poetic touch in its narration.
title: Kaalamega Karigindhi..?

overview: An Indian former Chief Minister receives a high-stakes call from Melbourne, Australia, demanding a ransom of 100 crores in exchange for a top-secret that could jeopardize their political party's future with elections around the corner.
title: Anaganaga Australia Lo

overview: Caught between tradition and his father's greed, prasad struggles to fulfill his dream of marriage.
title: Pelli Kaani Prasad

overview: Three teen boys discover a mystical auto-rickshaw that transforms into their village's centerpiece and unexpected hero.
title: Tuk Tuk

overview: A journey away, a return within.
title: Haaksha

overview: A teenager is trapped in a loop in his hostel and must find a way to escape.
title: FIGMENT

overview: Rishi reminisces about his time with Shruthi: shared sunsets, SPB melodies, chai, and unspoken feelings.
title: Mounaraagam

overview: A determined lawyer takes on a high-stakes case to defend a 19-year-old boy, challenging a system that has already branded him guilty.
title: Court: State vs. A Nobody

overview: Siddhu,scarred by a tragic past, reluctantly accepts the love proposal of Anjali, only to face breakup again. Adding to the chaos, His ex Maggie returnsto make amends for her mistakes, while a ruthless goon sets his sights on Siddhu.
title: Dilruba

overview: Jigel is a romantic comedy thriller. The hero Nandu is an expert 'locker technician' who cracks anylocker or safe in his own inimitable style. His character is very stylishly mountedwith all new and old gimmicks.
title: Jigel

overview: A gripping murder case in Hata City tests the limits of justice. Veer, an aspiring lawyer, takes on a high-stakes defense against a criminal charge, battling through courtroom revelations and twists.
title: Legally Veer

overview: Harsha gets trapped in his girlfriend Ahana's house with no way of escaping without being seen by her parents.
title: 14 Days (Girlfriend Intlo)

overview: A fearless software engineer fights workplace harassment, societal blame, and a murder accusation--only to uncover a dark conspiracy behind her husband's tragic accident.
title: Shivangi

overview: Mallanna's father decides to trade his life to secure relief funds for the family, but forgets. Funding for his final days, how will they make the ends meet?
title: Baapu - A Father's Story

overview: Devansh, a hitman who strictly observes Wednesdays as his personal holiday, but gets caught in a violent misunderstanding involving a mysterious pen drive, a freelance hitman, and a high-profile murder. Despite all the chaos, can he still enjoy his Wednesday with his favorite movie and a beer in hand?
title: Hitman’s Holiday

overview: A filmmaker recreates the tragic accident that shattered his family, hoping his art can revive his catatonic son.
title: Aarit

overview: Days before his wedding, A man's life implodes, yet he stays silent. As secrets surface, financial and social pressures mount. Can their love survive?
title: Takita Tadimi Tandana

overview: The path to true love does not run smoothly when a father and son seek marriage at the same time.
title: Mazaka

overview: The Devil's Chair is about a modern couple in a live-in relationship. After a series of reckless bets, Vikram loses not only his job but also his financial stability. Desperate and vulnerable, he stumbles upon a mysterious antique chair - home to Pundaksha, a sinister spirit from another realm. Vikram falls deeper into Pundaksha's trap. Will Ghost take control over him? Watch now!
title: The Devil's Chair

overview: In a tale of deceit and redemption, a son's greed leads him to betray his honest father, a government official in India, but as he plots his downfall, unexpected revelations force him to confront his own conscience.
title: Ramam Raghavam

overview: In a society where love is regulated by the Heart Bureau, Vaishnavi makes it her goal to take the system down by marrying a man not compatible with her not knowing the truth behind the man she falls for.
title: Gunde Nunchi

overview: A young man determined to reunite his estranged parents, embarking on an emotional journey to mend his family. The film delves into themes of love, sacrifice, and the strength of familial bonds.
title: Thala

overview: Brahma Anandam is a Telugu romantic comedy entertainer movie directed by RVS Nikhil. The movie casts Raja Goutham, Priya Vadlamani, and Aishwarya Holakkal in the main lead roles along with Brahmanandam, Vennela Kishore, and many others..
title: Brahma Anandam

overview: Sonu Model, a renowned beautician from the old city, is forced to disguise himself as Laila, leading to a series of comedic, romantic, and action-packed events. Chaos ensues in this hilarious laugh riot
title: Laila

overview: In Bhavani Ward 1997 , we Delve into the world of a Musical horror drama , where Ajay and Diya's love life turns into a miserable never ending nightmare when Diya gets possessed by an Evil Spirit .
title: Bhavani Ward 1997

overview: After losing everything and his wife's disappearance, Siddharth faces arrest. While investigating, he uncovers widespread societal crimes and vulnerabilities.
title: Oka Pathakam Prakaaram

overview: Fisherman Raju is deeply in love with Satya. However, at one point, she urges him to stop going to the sea and look for other jobs. Ignoring her plea, Raju ventures out and accidentally drifts into Pakistani waters, where he is arrested.
title: Thandel

overview: A Person who is mentally disabled has a daughter. He wanted to see her as a doctor.. But three persons raped and murdered her.. The father watched his daughter's murder. He didn't tell the fact in the police investigation why?
title: Punishment

overview: Krishna Narayana Murthy is a man of many quirks, especially when it comes to love. With two girlfriends and a family secret he can’t escape, he turns to a psychologist for help—but it’s the doctor who ends up losing their mind. Between wild proposals at a pub and a temple, Krishna’s hilarious journey uncovers the crazy rule his family follows, leaving everyone—including you—wondering just how far he’ll go. Buckle up for a comedy where love, family, and madness collide in the most unpredictable ways!
title: Love Is In The Vamsham

overview: Racharikam is a political action thriller set in the crime-infested Rachakonda. The film delves into intense village politics and societal struggles. The movie directed by Suresh Lankalapalli, and features Vijay Shankar, Apsara Rani, and Varun Sandesh in their pivotal roles.
title: Racharikam

overview: Two boys from rural Telangana travel to Goa to get some ‘girlfriend experience’.
title: Gopi Galla Goa Trip

overview: In 'Coffee with a Killer', a ruthless man receives a contract for an illegal activity. On this mission, he enters a coffee shop and observes his surroundings. Each table is filled with many stories. Who is the hitman's target? How does he do the job?
title: Coffee With A Killer

overview: The story of two lovers who find themselves stuck in the midst of two powerful politicians from the "pothugadda" constituency. Pothugadda explores the corrupt side of politics,shedding light on the manipulations and exploitation that often define the system. It also highlights themes of sacrifics, resilience and the unwavering power of love. with a blend of romance, political drama, and social commentary, pothugadda presents a compelling narrative that reveals the complexities of relationships and the challenges of surviving the murky world of politics.
title: Pothugadda

overview: BHEEM-A is an independent film based on a political crime drama. In it, a corrupt politician exploits his power and takes over a village and its people for his benefit. An honest lawyer tries to bring him down using the people working for him and does justice to the villagers.
title: BHEEM-A

overview: In Telugu State, influential politician J.C. Dharmendra Reddy is brutally murdered in his residence. Fearless cop Sudha takes on the case, diving into a web of secrets, deception, and lies. Can she uncover the truth, or will the system thwart her pursuit of justice?
title: Hathya

overview: A young girl's non-violent campaign to protect her grandfather's beloved tree from demolition, is inspired by Gandhi's philosophy of peaceful resistance.
title: Gandhi Tatha Chettu

overview: Avani marries her childhood love but soon faces unexpected trauma. What follows is a tale of vengeance with twists and turns at every corner.
title: Wife Off

overview: Mokshapatam Gayatri is a middle-class woman working as a floor manager at a hotel. She has dreams of giving a better life to her kid and making a decent living with her savings until her family loses money to her husband's friend, who dies in an accident. On a fateful day, she discovers a bag forgotten by a customer in the hotel room. Will this bag change her fate or throw her into more problems? Watch now!
title: Mokshapatam

overview: When a renowned tech entrepreneur is kidnapped upon returning to India, a police officer recruits her ex-boyfriend, a former cop now living a quiet family life, to assist in the rescue mission.
title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam

overview: A man defends a beleaguered rural community from murderous drug-traffickers.
title: Daaku Maharaaj

overview: Shyam, seeking escape from a clash with his father, embarks on a treacherous trek in the Himalayas. Megha is a seasoned guide who accompanies him. A snowstorm traps them in a remote homestay in the middle of their journey. Shyam falls for Megha's strength, but Megha doesn't respond
title: Neeli Megha Shyama

overview: Ram, a newly appointed district collector, takes charge in a city in Andhra Pradesh and immediately confronts the deeply entrenched corruption and inefficiency plaguing the government. Determined to bring reforms, he initiates sweeping changes, sparking a fierce conflict with a powerful state Minister.
title: Game Changer

overview: To keep his job, Prabhakar, a sleep-deprived IT employee, must conquer his insomnia before Friday’s crucial meeting. But as his desperate quest for sleep unfolds, he stumbles upon the buried secrets of the IT world and a maniac filmmaker.
title: Friday

overview: When found at the cross roads of love and separation a youngster named Aditya meets an elderly man called Balu, whose perspective on love influences Aditya to pursue his love. Who's Balu? what connection does Aditya and Balu share, did Aditya reconcile with his lover or not forms the rest.
title: AVADHI THE TALE OF LOVE

overview: When a college feud spirals out of control, Das must navigate escalating violence and personal vendettas, ultimately choosing strategy over brute force to protect those around him.
title: Runchod Das

overview: What starts as a casual discussion between a couple slowly turns into a heated argument that leads to questioning their relationship and characters.
title: Did You Mean It?

overview: Heartbroken and spiraling into alcoholism, a jilted lover desperately pursues his former muse, unwilling to accept their relationship's end.
title: Drinker Sai

overview: A string of beach murders rocks a coastal town, prompting police to hire a meticulous private eye. His investigation zeroes in on seven suspects, including a village couple, after a young girl's killing sparks public outcry.
title: Srikakulam SherlockHolmes

overview: A black and white film that takes place on a Sunday in the drunk town of Hanmakonda.
title: Chivaraku Migiledi

overview: An in-depth look at the making of S.S. Rajamouli's magnum opus, RRR, with behind-the-scenes footage and exclusive interviews. Explores the vision, challenges, and dedication involved in creating this cinematic phenomenon.
title: RRR: Behind & Beyond

overview: The story is set in the 1990s and follows the emotional and action-filled journey of Bachhala Malli, a rural hero. The narrative combines intense drama with romance, focusing on the protagonist’s challenges and personal growth in a rustic backdrop.
title: Bachhala Malli

overview: A 50-year-old corporate executive battling depression finds healing and redemption through reconnecting with her 80-year-old mother, discovering that parental love can restore what ambition has broken.
title: Oka Manchi Prema Katha

overview: Prasad, a 21-year-old overthinker, confesses his love for free-spirited Leela via text after three years of unspoken feelings. As he anxiously awaits her reply, his overthinking leads to unexpected troubles, capturing the innocence and nostalgia of love in a small town in Andhra Pradesh during the late 2000s.
title: Leela Vinodam

overview: Sindhu's world is shattered when her boyfriend vanishes. Held captive in a mental asylum, she must confront the evil forces driving her madness and confront the terrifying truth about her past in order to escape and uncover the truth.
title: Fear

overview: two friends are on a quest for a mysterious man by going through an adventurous trippy journey.
title: A Goa Tripp...

overview: A guy faces aftermath of a mistake which can be undone
title: SORRY

overview: As his smuggling empire grows, a brazen Pushpa longs for power and respect on his vengeful journey, while facing old rivals and new.
title: Pushpa 2 - The Rule

overview: Childhood pals scattered worldwide reconnect after years apart. Together, they road trip across India to Goa, one friend determined to confront his ex who broke his heart and show her the mistake she made.
title: Roti Kapda Romance

overview: When a single women and her boy friend reach in a small town, she begins to discover her connection to a ghost and the secret legacy her grandfather left behind
title: Mandira

overview: A young tribal boy from Telangana, develops an ardent admiration for Chief Minister KCR after facing injustice. Defying norms, he embarks on a journey as "Chota KCR," inspired by the leader's vision and policies.
title: Keshava Chandra Ramavath (KCR)

overview: Haunted by an astrological prophecy, Kamsaraja relentlessly torments his sister's family, believing her child will be his doom. Even in imprisonment, Krishna protects the family from Kamsaraja's evil plans.
title: Devaki Nandana Vasudeva

overview: Rambabu moves to the city to become an actor, leaving behind his family and lover, Seetha. Will he come back an actor, or is something worse in store for him?
title: Cinema Pichodu

overview: Rakesh, a happy-go-lucky young mechanic, must take on the ruthless land grabber Rankireddy to save his beloved ancestral car garage, uncovering unexpected truths.
title: Mechanic Rocky

overview: Surya is a street-smart bank employee, in a bid to protect his loved one, gets entangled in a complex multi-crore scam. He must do whatever it takes to prove his innocence.
title: Zebra

overview: Set against the backdrop of a beautiful hiltop village surrounded by dense forest and a decaying tea plantation is the story of sudha,an under privileged woman who reaches this village after her marriage with chandran.They stay along with chandran's brother and aging mother in a confined single room house with a make shift separation to create space for the couple. The room has a strange light without switch which changes its colour often.where she struggles to find her privacy.Meanwhile her husband constantly attempts to physically exert his dominance over her.Traumatised sudha decides to fight her battle and take revenge on chandran,will the powerless sudha succeed in her fight for survival?
title: Repati Velugu

overview: The comedic tale of three friends, living life to the fullest in the chaotic world of college, is about to take a hilariously unpredictable turn. As they juggle romance, friendships, and academics, their misadventures escalate into a madness of ridiculous escapades, laugh-out-loud humor, and unforgettable experiences.
title: Drama Kaiku Mama

overview: Sreeyansh, a troubled student, battles the shadows of his past while adapting to a new life in a college hostel. When eerie encounters and terrifying visions begin to blur the line between reality and delusion. His past resurfaces in unexpected ways, Sreeyansh must confront his darkest secrets and unravel the mystery before it consumes him entirely.
title: Gatham

overview: In a surreal afterlife, a young man confronts his memories, regrets, and relationships as he revisits the moments leading up to his untimely death, while his best friend in the living world struggles to come to terms with the role he played in the tragedy, we explore the thin line between guilt and forgiveness, and whether it’s ever too late to make peace with the past.
title: Chalaname Chitram

overview: Vikram, a reclusive artist, finds inspiration in Lilly, a spirited fellow artist who brings hope into his life. As their bond deepens, unexpected challenges test their connection, forcing Vikram to confront the fragile nature of human relationships and find the courage to face heartbreak and loss.
title: Lilly

overview: A young man's desperate attempt to escape his problems leads to a clash of egos and a reckoning with the past.
title: Avasarama? Ahamkarama!

overview: Set between the years 1958 and 1982, Matka tells the story of Vasu, who rises from poverty to create a powerful gambling empire in India, ultimately leading the nation into a battle with the government. Based on real events, the tale explores themes of love, moral choices, and the consequences of ambition.
title: Matka

overview: 3 friends play ouija board, spirit game to make a youtube video but one of the friends get terrified and shocked when the spirit comes for true.
title: AATMA RAAVE

overview: In a village where success depends on government exams, Raju must choose: follow his love for Shirisha despite her father's disapproval or stay on the family farm. As he navigates love and ambition, he wonders-can love conquer all? Will his dreams lead to success? And do exam results define his future? This heartfelt, humorous tale explores the balance between love and ambition.
title: Eesaraina!?

overview: In 19th-century, a sacred temple's blessing turns to a curse when betrayal shatters faith. A young man must confront a ruthless tyrant, unraveling dark secrets, to restore his family's honor and bring hope back to a drought-stricken land.
title: Jathara

overview: The movie depicts the life of a courageous Jithender Reddy who rises as a student leader, fighting for the rights of his fellow students and inspired by his mentor`s guidance.
title: Jithender Reddy

overview: It is an unusual mix of two love stories: 'Father and Son' and 'Son and a Beautiful girl.
title: Dhoom Dhaam

overview: Rishi falls in love with a girl named Tara, a budding racer, due to a mistake made by his friend Yaji... Rishi and Tara who were meant to be close get separated. Rishi works as an intern in the racing circuit in London due to the suggestion given by Yaji.
title: Appudo Ippudo Eppudo

overview: Chaitra Loves her family and her family believes in superstitions. As they prepare for a Ritualistic-Cult Suicide, one person intrudes: The young man who loved Chaitra.
title: Telisinavallu

overview: Set in 1970s Abhinaya Vasudev, an orphaned and happy-go-lucky postman, treats the Krishnagiri village populace as his extended family. When several women missing and Vasudev’s loved one is nearly abducted, he is determined to find answers.
title: KA

overview: A cash-strapped bank cashier embarks on a risky investment scheme and soon gets drawn into the murky world of money laundering.
title: Lucky Baskhar

overview: Sathya, a self-centered aspiring actor who lacks talent, believes he is meant to be famous. After facing rejection, he sets off on a journey through Kerala to learn about emotions and life. Stranded in the village of Kadamakkudy, he meets a mysterious man named D. Salman. The people he meets and the experiences he has change him in ways he never expected.
title: Narudi Brathuku Natana

overview: Manasa and Chaitanya are engaged to be married, but when Chaitanya quits his job, will the wedding go through?
title: Laggam

overview: An underprivileged villager and a victim of caste-driven politics in his village, forced to run away with his daughter Saraswati, but returns after undergoing a spiritual reincarnation, which in turn changes how the village receives him.
title: Pottel

overview: Cotton candy is a story about a guy “ Aadhi “ who forgets his past in an accident comes to a college and recollects his past. The story revolves about how he recollects and how he changes during his stay in the college.
title: Cotton Candy: Prelims (volume 1)

overview: In a tale of cosmic destinies and human struggles, Bharat and Chandra navigate the trials of family, friendship, and identity. When tragedy strikes, Bharat's journey through the Celestial Hades offers a chance at redemption, leading to the mystical realm of Soluna—where the sun and moon coexist, unraveling the profound bond between them.
title: AGNISOMA - Embers of Friendship

overview: A Telangana village under prohibition in 1995, where a powerful toddy tapper, Pratap Goud, exploits villagers.
title: Kallu Compound 1995

overview: Narayana Reddy who finds himself entangled in a web of emotions as his uncertain love life takes unexpected turns.
title: Love Reddy

overview: When his wife announces a surprise pregnancy, a man decides to sue the condom company he deems responsible.
title: Janaka Aithe Ganaka

overview: Johnny, a car mechanic,  who grew up thinking of his adopted father Srinivas as a superhero,  prepared to go to any length to save his father, unknowingly embarks on a journey with his biological father.
title: Maa Nanna Superhero

overview: When terrorists target a young girl who witnessed an assassination, a heroic taxi driver comes to the rescue.
title: Viswam

overview: The course of true love is strewn with misunderstandings and unwanted drama for a young couple from theatre families.
title: Utsavam

original_title: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
overview: The inspirational journey of Dr. Avul Pakir Jainulabdeen Abdul Kalam, Indian aerospace scientist and statesman who served as the 11th president of India from 2002 to 2007.
title: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

overview: When a cash-strapped taxi driver is confronted with a moral crossroads, he grapples with the choice between maintaining his integrity or succumbing to temptation for financial survival.
title: Tatva

overview: Narule Narakam (Hell is people) is a Telugu short film that delves into the complexities of human behaviour and pervasive issue of excessive pharmacotherapy practices in Psychiatry and a psychiatrist who stands alone against all the odds, only to lose his job forever.
title: Hell is People

overview: This story is about a successful NRI called Virat, who believes in doing what his heart says. Though he succeeded and has everything in life at his foot step, there is something else he desires to accomplish. What sets his goal and what wonders his determination does forms the story.
title: Pravasa Bharatheeyudu

overview: Kali is a Telugu movie starring Prince Cecil, Naresh Agastya and Neha Krishnan in prominent roles. It is directed by Siva Sashu.
title: Kali

overview: Reckless 21-year-old Bunny squanders his father's savings and juggles relationships. After a wake-up call, he faces a tough choice between love and responsibility in this Light-Hearted, emotional journey.
title: Ramnagar Bunny

overview: Balu Gani Talkies: Cinema and theatre are like heads and tails both value the same! Balu gets into big trouble to save an adult movie theatre, his late father's legacy. Will he be able to own his property? Watch the exciting, emotional movie about blackmail murder with many secrets! Don't miss.
title: Balu Gani Talkies

overview: The eternal battle of the sexes is played out across several generations of a family who seek to obtain a fortune.
title: Swag

overview: A handicapped lawyer and her father are on a mission to fight cases related to a suicide case that opens the famous ACT "R.T.I" and stumbles upon a larger conspiracy later on.
title: RTI

overview: Devara, a fearless man from a coastal region, embarks on a perilous journey into the treacherous world of the sea to safeguard the lives of his people. Unbeknownst to him, his brother Bhaira is plotting a conspiracy against him. As events unfold, Devara passes on his legacy to his mild-mannered and timid son, Varada.
title: Devara: Part 1

overview: A conversational social commentary that goes through a series of discussions, exploring the intrapersonal struggle between standing up for your morals and wanting to be part of a group.  The second short film from the makers of 02:30 ( TWO THIRTY), made on a zero budget, but with tonnes of passion for cinema.
title: BITCH

overview: When Sundarlal finds out about an IT Raid on his properties, he hides 100 Crores in his bungalow. But when he can't find the money and dies in shock. Where did the money go? Was is stolen?
title: 100 Crores

overview: In Kothula Gutta, Shiva dreams beyond his village. When love and fate intertwine, an epic journey of challenges and redemption unfolds.
title: Pailam Pilaga

overview: The story revolves around a sheep that becomes entangled in a conflict between two communities, with an underlying religious tension.
title: Gorre Puranam

overview: When a chilling pattern emerges, Vaishnavi's relentless pursuit of justice leads her to uncover a sinister pattern connecting the seemingly unrelated murders. Anonymous Warnings As the investigation intensifies, Vaishnavi receives another cryptic file, predicting yet another murder on the horizon. Race Against Time Racing against the clock, Vaishnavi follows leads to the latest crime scene, discovering an unimaginable tragedy that shatters Shiva's world. With every twist and turn, the narrative spirals into a labyrinth of hidden motives, hidden alliances, and buried secrets.
title: Hide N Seek

overview: A biography of Indian politician Gummadi Narsaiah, who was a leading member of the Communist Party of India New Democracy.
title: Untitled Gummadi Narsaiah Biopic

overview: LifeStories is a film about 6 short stories taking the audience through the lives of the protagonists. Oscillating between joy, companionship, loneliness, camaraderie, guilt and unadulterated love.
title: #Lifestories

overview: Make a Wish is a Suspense Thriller Drama about three Women, their relationship issues and an intruder.
title: Make a Wish

overview: Babu and Yesu, former delivery agents, embark on a thrilling mission as special agents, facing extraordinary challenges with humor, surprises, and nonstop excitement.
title: Mathu Vadalara 2

overview: A village is terrorized by a demonic entity and a deadly ancient curse.
title: Kalinga

overview: In the depths of despair, Arjun believed his trials were insurmountable: heartbreak, toxic friendships, burdens that seemed colossal. Yet, an unexpected revelation shattered his illusions. Learning the truth of his birth, conceived in a traumatic past, his perspective shifted. From the ashes of disillusionment, he forged a new understanding of life’s resilience, finding solace, strength, and the courage to rise above.
title: Shattered Illusions

overview: Patela, a midwit  finds himself entrapped in a maze of love and deceit from a highly educated Akshara whom he loves but  she is a phantom with an ulterior agenda trying to have him killed.
title: Uruku Patela

overview: A young mother faces challenges when her son fails to secure passing marks in mathematics, inciting events that test the family's resilience and unity.
title: 35 - Chinna Katha Kaadu

overview: Krishna's family deals with sons' unemployment, daughter's marriage prospects. A hidden secret emerges, challenging their unity. They navigate this crisis while reflecting societal issues.
title: Sarangadhariya

overview: Set in Sokulapalem, bound by a promise to his mother, Surya, an LIC agent leads a normal life on six days, maintains a careful ledger of everyone made him angry,unleashing his anger only on Saturdays, solely for justifiable reasons. A tragic incident pits him on a collision course with the ruthless and borderline-manic cop Daya.
title: Saripodhaa Sanivaaram

overview: Revolves around the life of Lovaraju, a theatre artist and a gully cricketer in a village named Lampakalova.
title: Parakramam

overview: A father and son's life changes dramatically after their bank account is mysteriously credited with a large amount of money.
title: Maruthi Nagar Subramanyam

overview: The documentary explores the education system in Andhra Pradesh & Telangana, focusing on why students primarily choose careers as engineers or doctors. It delves into the reason behind this trend and features interviews with students, educators and parents. The film aims to uncover the underlying issues and shed light on the realities of the educational system.
title: Study

overview: Set in Godavari region, When Karthik comes home between COVID lockdowns, he connects with old friends and falls for a woman whose romantic feelings seem influenced by her caste.
title: Aay

overview: Revolves around two married couples entangled in a complex web where trust is eroded, shocking betrayals are revealed and lives spiral into an intricate web of intrigue.
title: EVOL

overview: Big Bull, a notorious assassin, wants to achieve immortality by transferring his memories to "iSmart" Shankar, who already has another's person's memories, leading to the intense confrontation between Shankar and Big Bull.
title: Double iSmart

overview: A man in his 50’s convinces his family of misfits to go on a road trip to Goa to immerse his father’s ashes, unaware of the adventures and goof-ups that the journey has in store for them.
title: Veeranjaneyulu Vihara Yatra

overview: Just four days before wedding, a fiercely honest Income Tax officer Bachchan’s life takes a dramatic turn when he is reinstated from suspension and tasked with raiding the home of the powerful and ruthless politician Mutyam Jaggaiah.
title: Mr Bachchan

overview: Go back in time and experience a roller coaster ride of emotions with the Committee Kurrollu.
title: Committee Kurrollu

overview: Environmental activist Purushottam Reddy, alias Simbaa, wages a battle against industrial pollution. Saving three lives sparks their gratitude journey, fueling a quest to bring justice against nature's adversaries.
title: Simbaa

overview: Usha Parinayam story is all about a young girl and the developments ahead of her marriage life and how she handled the pressures and pleasures and also her romantic feelings and youthful exuberance.
title: Usha Parinayam

overview: Siddhu falls in love with his classmate Dharani, struggles to confess his love owing to his introverted nature. As Siddhu gathers the courage to express his feelings, a shocking secret comes to light, throwing his life into turmoil.
title: Alanaati Ramachandrudu

overview: A stand-up comic, gynecologist, hotel manager, police officer and a drug addict, among others reach an abandoned mental asylum by a mysterious host, who informs them that they would all be dead by dawn for their past sins and proceeds killing. Will they live to see another day?
title: Viraaji

overview: Average student nani learns to conquer love, fights and family turbulence in his four years of college life
title: Average Student Nani

overview: A short about a director and his friends getting ready for a producer meeting on a hot summer day.
title: Neramu Siksha

overview: A teddy bear named Buddy is in trouble and asks pilot Aditya Ram for help. Can the duo join forces and help each other out?
title: Buddy

overview: Giri, dedicated to reuniting missing people with loved ones, marries Shailaja, an orphan. Discovering her pregnancy, his joy turns to shock when tasked to find a missing woman, revealed to be the real Shailaja. Will he find out his wife`s true identity?
title: Tiragabadara Saami

overview: Chandrasekhar, a humble loan recovery agent gets unwittingly entangled into a sinister international conspiracy to cause mass destruction in India. Realizing it's divine orchestration to avert an impending disaster, he stands up to face the dangers.
title: Shivam Bhaje

overview: A brilliant yet unconventional detective is drawn into a complex web of lies and secrets when a high-profile case shakes a quiet town. As he uncovers hidden connections and dangerous truths, he realizes the mystery is far deeper and more personal than it first appeared.
title: Detective

overview: A serial killer targets brides, while a magnate's son infiltrates a news channel, leading to a tense showdown between hunter and hunted.
title: Operation Raavan

overview: Nowadays Doctors give treatment for patient to make money but Rahul treat's Patient without expecting money. one girl named Nidhi was impressed with Rahul's attitude and both fell in love.
title: Atu Nuvve Itu Nuvve

overview: Rachit Ram, heir to a multi-billion-dollar corporate conglomerate, sets off on his journey to fulfill a daunting challenge of living like a commoner for 100 days in the middle of nowhere with absolutely no money and privileges, while his aunt and cousin brother conspire together to make him fail his challenge.
title: Purushothamudu

overview: It's birthday time and it's celebration time. Based on true incidents.
title: The Birthday Boy
